title: Letting Them Make Mistakes
itunes:author: Guest: Crystal Paine
itunes:summary:
As your child grows, he or she will make mistakes. But instead of shielding them from all their errors, it's best to let them try and learn. John and Danny offer encouragement to parents who are afraid to let their kids make decisions for themselves. Featuring Crystal Paine.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Get Crystal Paine's book "Love-Centered Parenting" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2021-12-09?refcd=1311201

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/letting-them-make-mistakes/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
